extraDescription: Design and development of training for Common System for Grants and Contributions Project Life Cycle - Phase II
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100004401 dated July 17, 2015. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
